description.title: XML
texts:
XML (Extensible Markup Language) is a markup language and file format. It is used to store and transfer data on the web and in many other applications. XML is widely used. 

XML steps in as a versatile tool for encoding and organizing data in a way that both humans and machines can comprehend. 

The main purpose of XML is serialization, i.e., storing, transmitting, and reconstructing arbitrary data.
